meanings.definition: The process of introducing ions into the body through the skin using a direct current.
meanings.sent1: Iontophoreses helps deliver ions into the body through the skin.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use iontophoreses to introduce ions into the body for treatment.
meanings.sent3: The ions had a party on my skin thanks to iontophoreses!
meanings.sent4: Iontophoreses is like a tiny electric ferry transporting ions through the skin.
meanings.sent5: The sensation of iontophoreses feels like a gentle electric massage on the skin.

meanings.definition: The application of a small electric current to drive medication into the body.
meanings.sent1: With iontophoreses, a small electric current helps medication enter the body.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes use iontophoreses to drive medication into their bodies.
meanings.sent3: The medication took a ride on the electric current in iontophoreses!
meanings.sent4: Iontophoreses acts like a tiny electric push for medication to enter the body.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of iontophoreses in delivering medication is impressive.
